sentences.en: Ammonification, nitrification and nitrogen assimilation in HA - TF are predominant.
sentences.cn: 氨化作用、同化作用及滤池的硝化作用是氮的主要转化形式.

sentences.en: And the process of assimilation goes on unimpeded.
sentences.cn: 这个同化过程在畅通无阻地继续下去.

sentences.en: Assimilation of the 2000–2001 CO MOPITT retrievals with optimized surface emissions.
sentences.cn: 用最优化地面散发反演2000-2001COMOPITT的同化.

sentences.en: Ethnic amalgamation ethnic assimilation and ethnic fusion of culture are three kinds of different phenomena in ethnic relation.
sentences.cn: 民族融合、民族同化和民族文化融合是民族关系中存在的三种不同的现象。

sentences.en: Land data assimilation is a new means for multi - source geospatial data integration.
sentences.cn: 陆面数据同化是一种集成多源地理空间数据的新思路.

sentences.en: Microbe assimilation plays a leading role in the intermittent reaction.
sentences.cn: 间歇反应中微生物同化作用占主导地位.

sentences.en: Peptic ulcer a common disease in assimilation department . Dr.
sentences.cn: 消化性溃疡是消化内科的常见病.

sentences.en: Process of soaking up or assimilation of one substance by another.
sentences.cn: 一种介质向另一种介质渗透和同化的过程。

sentences.en: Several reactions involving the direct assimilation of ammoniainto organic compounds have been described in living systems.
sentences.cn: 人们已叙述过生命系统中几个直接将氨同化成有机化合物的反应.

sentences.en: The " d " in " grandpa " has been lost by assimilation to " p ".
sentences.cn: " grandpa " 中的 " d " 因受 " p " 的同化而不发音.

sentences.en: The assimilation of some foods is more easily than that of others.
sentences.cn: 有些食物的吸收比另一些更容易.

sentences.en: The degradation or assimilation of fatty materials is often restricted because of their relative insolubility.
sentences.cn: 脂肪物质因其溶解度低,分解作用和吸收作用常受限制.

sentences.en: The first period of the English Renaissance was one of imitation and assimilation.
sentences.cn: 英国文艺复兴初期只是一个学习模仿与同化的阶段。

sentences.en: The main diagenesis is fractional crystallization assimilation and contamination.
sentences.cn: 成岩作用是分离结晶和同化混染联合作用.

sentences.en: The p in cupboard has been lost by assimilation to b.
sentences.cn: 里的p由于和b同化而失去读音.

sentences.en: The process behind the assimilation and distribution of knowledge is already altering.
sentences.cn: 在知识的吸收和分发后面的过程已经是改变.

sentences.en: the rapid assimilation of new ideas
This technique brings life to instruction and eases assimilation of knowledge.
sentences.cn: 这一方法给教学带来了活力，也使知识的吸收变得容易了。
